entries.title: Infrastructure Improvements
entries.description: Enhanced platform performance through codebase cleanup and optimization. Removed unused components and dependencies to improve loading times and reduce bundle size.
changes: Optimized codebase by removing unused components and dependencies
Improved application performance and reduced bundle size
Enhanced platform stability through infrastructure cleanup

entries.title: Enhanced Authentication & Landing Experience
entries.description: Improved authentication flow with better domain verification and a refreshed landing page. Updated tracking systems for better privacy.
changes: Updated landing page with improved user experience
Enhanced domain verification for better security
Improved SIWE (Sign-In with Ethereum) authentication
Removed tracking for enhanced privacy

entries.title: Notifications & Bookmarks
entries.description: Added real-time notifications and local bookmark functionality. Improved error handling with prettier error messages.
changes: Added comprehensive notification system
Implemented local bookmarks for saving posts
Prettier error messages for better user experience
Updated dependencies for improved stability

entries.title: Social Features Enhancement
entries.description: Enhanced social interactions with improved handles, autocomplete, and post management. Added comprehensive testing for handle parsing.
changes: Added handle autocomplete for easier user mentions
Improved handle parser with comprehensive tests
Fixed post deletion functionality
Enhanced following flow with direct on-chain writes

entries.title: Base Chain Integration
entries.description: Added support for Base chain with dedicated account connector and global chain configuration.
changes: Added Base account connector for Base chain support
Implemented global default chain ID configuration
Updated SIWE package for improved authentication

entries.title: Reactions & Sharing
entries.description: Implemented comprehensive reaction system with likes and reposts. Fixed sharing functionality and improved UI interactions.
changes: Added like and repost actions for posts
Updated reactions implementation for better performance
Fixed sharing links functionality
Fixed hover effects on glass-style UI elements
General codebase cleanup

entries.title: UI Polish & Fixes
entries.description: Final polish with animation fixes and improved content moderation by hiding deleted posts.
changes: Fixed landing page animation for smoother experience
Implemented hiding of deleted posts for cleaner feeds
Enhanced overall UI responsiveness
